flawed_nl_solution:
The rectangular tables seat 7*10=<<7*10=70>>70 pupils.
The square tables will seat 90-70=<<90-70=40>>40 pupils.
The library needs 40/4=<<40/4=10.0>>10.0 square tables.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
